aka: Aurora Street - Refuge of All Worlds
this_title: Rua Aurora – Refúgio de todos os mundos
trans_title: Aurora Street - Refuge of All Worlds
introduction: In the city of São Paulo, we follow people from different worlds who inhabit the same street, in the forgotten center of the metropolis, where life pulsates latently and rebuilds itself every day.源自：http://etudoverdade.com.br/en/filme/51497-Rua-Aurora-ndash-Refugio-de-todos-os-mundos
foreign_title: Rua Aurora – Refúgio de todos os mundos
